projects.title: Angry Birds
projects.description: A small segment of Angry Birds remade in Unity with C# for an assignment at Mediacollege. Made with a team of 3 programmers and 3 artists in 4 weeks time.

projects.title: Discord Animate
projects.description: Discord animate is a project made with C# and the Discord.Net API wrapper, it animates messages within Discord by editing them at a set interval. This project was made to learn more about the APIs, web socket clients and just for fun.
